title: That Wonderful Mexican Band: A Memoir of The Great Depression
description: Welcome to Fond du Lac, Wisconsin, a small Midwestern town struggling through the Great Depression. The misadventures of a poor minority family with big dreams, as told by oldest son Thomas, reveal a deep love in the face of serious struggles and a rich life in spite of poverty. The Ramirezes' story is humorous, bittersweet, and-above all-honest. That Wonderful Mexican Band is sure to strike a chord with anyone who grew up during the Great Depression or ever wondered what it was like to live "way back then."
author: Thomas P. Ramirez
